feature.label: The BuildML Build Tool
feature.description: The BuildML Build Tool provides the ability to create and manage a software build system using a UML-like visual language. Instead of describing the software build system using an obscure language (such as that required by GNU Make), users may drag and drop files and compilation actions onto a drawing canvas, allowing easy specification of the build steps. For large build systems, the build steps can be divided into packages, making it possible to comprehend the higher level build process, but also to drill down into the detail when necessary.
